<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Enable Unified Alert</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v2/unified-alerts/{type}/{id}/enable"}></MethodEndpoint>



Enable a unified alert by its type and ID.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"type","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The type of the unified alert. options are: `logs`, `metrics`."}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The ID of the unified alert."}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"204"} value={"204"}><div>

Unified alert enabled successfully.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"404"} value={"404"}><div>

Alert Not Found. The specified alert ID does not exist.

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
